newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Kunming Store opens new flagship store.
newsitem.headline: Kunming Store opens new flagship store.

text.p: Kunming Department Store (Group) Co Ltd opened a new flagship store in Kunming, capital of Yunnan province, on Thursday, the Shenzhen-based Securities Times said on Friday.
The five-floor 20,500-sq-metre new store in downtown Kunming has double the space of its former retail building in the city and will greatly help 1997 performance, it said.
The firm will also invest 400 million yuan in a 22-floor four-star hotel on top of the new store, it said but gave no timetable for the hotel project.
In an annual report, the firm said it had after-tax profits of 17.92 million yuan last year, against 29.78 million in 1994.

It blamed the drop in net earnings for 1995 on the effects of an explosion in its flagship department store on January 14 last year, which a company spokesman said cut more than 10 million yuan off the firm's profits in 1995.

He said that an investigation revealed that two bombs had been set off by a pair of suspects, causing serious property damage, killing one person and injuring 90. He said that insurance claims filed for the damage had long gone unpaid.
The company reported net earnings of 5.55 million yuan for the first half of 1996 against 7.06 million a year earlier.
